name: quickbase-js
description: QuickBase JavaScript client for frameworks and vanilla JS

scripts.build: npm run build:esm && npm run build:umd
scripts.build:esm: rimraf dist/esm dist/temp dist/temp-src && node --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; import { pathToFileURL } from "node:url"; register("ts-node/esm", pathToFileURL("./"));' build-esm.js
scripts.build:umd: rimraf dist/umd dist/temp dist/temp-src && node --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; import { pathToFileURL } from "node:url"; register("ts-node/esm", pathToFileURL("./"));' build-umd.js
scripts.release:push: npm run release:beta && git push --follow-tags origin main
scripts.release:publish: npm run release:push && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.release:stable: standard-version && git push --follow-tags origin main && npm publish
scripts.fix-spec: node --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; import { pathToFileURL } from "node:url"; register("ts-node/esm", pathToFileURL("./"));' open-api/fix-spec-main.ts
scripts.gen:openapi: rimraf src/generated && node --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; import { pathToFileURL } from "node:url"; register("ts-node/esm", pathToFileURL("./"));' open-api/regenerate-client.ts
scripts.gen:openapi:post: node --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; import { pathToFileURL } from "node:url"; register("ts-node/esm", pathToFileURL("./"));' open-api/post-process-generated.ts
scripts.gen:openapi:all: npm run fix-spec && npm run gen:openapi && npm run gen:openapi:post
scripts.gen:unified: node --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; import { pathToFileURL } from "node:url"; register("ts-node/esm", pathToFileURL("./"));' open-api/generate-unified-interface.ts
scripts.gen:docsdata: node --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; import { pathToFileURL } from "node:url"; register("ts-node/esm", pathToFileURL("./"));' open-api/generateDocsJson.ts
scripts.gen:all: npm run fix-spec && npm run gen:openapi && npm run gen:openapi:post && npm run gen:unified && npm run gen:docsdata && npm run docs:build
scripts.log-gen: node --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; import { pathToFileURL } from "node:url"; register("ts-node/esm", pathToFileURL("./"));' tools/log-gen.ts
scripts.test:all: vitest run tests/vitest/**/**/*.test.ts --reporter=basic && playwright test tests/playwright/qb --config playwright.config.ts --reporter=dot --quiet
